SEARCH
Package cookbook.controller

Class RecipeDaoImpl

java.lang.Object
cookbook.controller.BaseDaoImpl
cookbook.controller.RecipeDaoImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
RecipeDao
public class RecipeDaoImpl extends BaseDaoImpl implements RecipeDao
The RecipeDaoImpl class implements the RecipeDao interface. It provides functionality for creating, updating, deleting, and retrieving recipes as well as managing recipe-related operations such as converting portions and tagging.
